description: This file defines FastAPI API routes for managing a to-do list, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, toggling completion status, and deleting to-do items. It interacts with SQLAlchemy ORM models and uses dependency injection for database sessions.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router group for todos API endpoints.

methods.name: TodoModel _get_todo_or_404(db: Session, todo_id: int)
methods.description: Internal helper to retrieve a Todo by ID or raise 404 if not found.

methods.name: List[TodoRead] list_todos(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handler to list all to-do items.

methods.name: TodoRead create_todo(payload: TodoCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handler to create a new to-do item.

methods.name: TodoRead get_todo_by_id( id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the to-do item", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handler to retrieve a specific to-do by its ID.

methods.name: TodoRead update_todo( payload: TodoUpdate, id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the to-do item", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handler to update an existing to-do item.

methods.name: TodoRead toggle_todo( id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the to-do item", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handler to toggle the 'completed' status of a to-do.

methods.name: None delete_todo( id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the to-do item", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handler to delete a to-do item.
